output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. CMF Number: No CMF number is present, though this is from an official party organization.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" as presidential candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Uses plural forms and calls to action ("votăm") - Uses hashtags to increase visibility
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral intent - Directly calls for votes for Marcel Ciolacu - Uses campaign slogans ("#AlăturiDeOameni") - Promotes both presidential and parliamentary elections - Contains explicit voting instructions with dates
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material - Contains no journalistic content or educational information - Pure promotional content for PSD and their candidate

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly asks for votes for a specific presidential candidate - Contains direct campaign messaging - Is paid advertising reaching a large audience - Comes from an official party organization - Is running after the end of the presidential campaign period
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Social Democrat - Organizația Județeană Hunedoara, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook si Instagram (ID: 1540641106581455) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care îndeamnă în mod explicit la votarea candidatului ION-MARCEL CIOLACU la alegerile prezidențiale, utilizând mesajul "Pe 24 noiembrie și 8 decembrie #votăm Marcel Ciolacu - președinte al României!". Reclama a fost distribuită către un public țintă estimat între 100,001 și 500,000 de persoane, reprezentând propagandă electorală activă în afara perioadei legale de campanie.
